projects.title: Linux Kernel Module for Process Resource Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a Linux kernel module to track heap memory usage and open file counts for monitored processes.

responsibilities: Worked on bug fixing, performance tuning, and module-level enhancements for enterprise applications in an agile development environment.
Designed and developed key pages like the homepage, product listings, and user dashboards with a focus on clean layout and usability across devices.
Worked closely with backend developers to connect frontend components with APIs, making sure data like products and user info loaded smoothly.
Improved the user experience for both buyers and sellers by simplifying navigation, fixing layout issues, and adding small but useful features.
